gobblin.metrics

Class ContextAwareGauge<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.metrics.ContextAwareGauge<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the ContextAwareGauge's value
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Gauge<T>, Metric, ContextAwareMetric, ProxyMetric

    public class ContextAwareGauge<T>
extends Object
implements Gauge<T>, ContextAwareMetric
    A type of Gauges that that are aware of their MetricContext and can have associated Tags.

    This class wraps a Gauge and delegates calls to public methods of Gauge to the wrapped Gauge.
